name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Also, living longer makes you think more long-term.  :|      If people had to choke on their mistakes, they'd be less inclined to make them in the first place.

source_obj.text: Also, living longer makes you think more long-term.  :|      If people had to choke on their mistakes, they'd be less inclined to make them in the first place.
